channel.title: ! Please Answer My Brief Moparscape Question!
channel.description: OK. Im just wondering, CORRECT ME IF IM WRONG, to get into a server u must type in the port # also with the ip# i succesfully log in and then after maybe 1 minute "Connection Lost. Trying to Reestablish" Is there anything i can do?? Please help im new to this :confused:

item.title: ! Please Answer My Brief Moparscape Question!
item.dc:creator: @T_I_T_A_N T I T A N
item.description:
@T_I_T_A_N wrote:

Well you see i join like every server with 100%. sometimes it just says Error connecting… Must be down

Read full topic
item.source: ! Please Answer My Brief Moparscape Question!

item.title: ! Please Answer My Brief Moparscape Question!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

A server restart every minute? Not likely. TITAN you might be joining a server that the owner updates ever minute for every change in the code. I suggest you wait it out or join another server.

Read full topic
item.source: ! Please Answer My Brief Moparscape Question!
